contextId.information: This phrase refers to people. AT: "the sick people" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_nominaladj]])
This phrase refers to people. AT: "the sick people" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_nominaladj]])

Here "the dead" refers to people who are dead and "the living" refers to people who are alive. Also, the missing information can be added. AT: "of people who are dead, but the God of people who are alive" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_nominaladj]] and [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_ellipsis]])
contextId.quote: of the dead, but of the living

contextId.information: The phrase "the poor" refers to poor people. Also, the missing information may be added. AT: "and the money given to poor people" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_nominaladj]])
